content:
My first suggestion is to verify that the SMTP server is for that account. To do that, - click 'account settings' - click the account name in left sidebar - now, on bottom line in right side of screen, click the 'edit SMTP server' button - on next screen, verify that the email account is correct, and not for one of your other accounts - if it is for another account, go back to prior screen and click the drop-down menu for outgoing SMTP server and set to the right server.

The above may not be relevant, but it is a common problem when a user has multiple accounts with same provider.
